original_text: Laban said to him, “Just because you are a relative of mine, should you work for me for nothing? Tell me what your wages should be.”
korean_text: 라반이 야곱에게 이르되 네가 비록 내 생질이나 어찌 그저 내 일을 하겠느냐 네 품삯을 어떻게 할지 내게 말하라

sentences.original_text: Just because you are a relative of mine
should you work for me for nothing?
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 위해 아무 대가 없이 일해야 하겠느냐?

sentences.original_text: Tell me what your wages should be
